Listen To A Mash-Up Of Notorious B.I.G. And The “Serial” Theme Music

posted by Katie K on December 19, 2014 in Audio

Image via Soundcloud

I’ve been home for Christmas for approximately 32 hours. In these 32 hours, I’ve already listened to nine episodes from the addicting and hugely popular podcast Serial. The 12th and final episode in the series aired last night and I’m already having separation anxiety symptoms just thinking about the story ending. Luckily producer Fafu is here to help the goodbye process. The musician created a mash-up of the show’s theme music and Notorious B.I.G.’s “Somebody’s Gotta Die,” and it’s pretty awesome. Stream his production below and if you need me, I’ll be listening to it on repeat as I drink whiskey and preemptively miss Sarah’s soothing voice.

(Complex)

Tags:  Notorious B.I.G.

OLDRuelle – “Big Guns”
